list_definition.definition: to think of as being very good, important etc; to respect

list_definition.definition: to think of (with a particular emotion or feeling)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He regards his wife’s behaviour/behavior with amusement.
He regarded me over the top of his glasses.
He ran into the burning house without regard for his safety.
He shows no regard for other people.
I hold him in high regard.
